{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T21:17:14.000Z", "description": "

Role can be performed remotely , candidate needs to work US EST hours.


Working with state of the art technologies as part of AI/ ML platform's team enabling scientists in Drug discovery R&D, Safety, Supply chain, Digital Health.


Key requirements:

\u2022BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering

\u20226+ years of experience designing & writing production-quality code

\u2022Good Knowledge of NVIDIA SDKs and HPC parallel systems

\u2022Excellent C/C++, CUDA and Python programming and software design skills, including debugging, performance analysis, and test

\u2022Knowledge of AWS/ Azure/ GCP cloud ecosystems to work closely on integration efforts with DevOps engineers

\u2022Exceptional attention to detail, close engagement in product design, and a constant focus on user experience

\u2022Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in a agile & dynamic product-oriented teams on challenging projects

\u2022Good verbal and written communication skills in English


Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd:

\u2022Experience working with NVIDIA/ Xilinx or custom ASIC SDKs

2+ yrs of experience optimising AI/ ML applications
